title: Rajasthan Royals Defeat Gujarat Titans by 3 Wickets
image_instruction: Show highlights of the match, including Shimron Hetmyer's match-winning innings
script: In a thrilling encounter, the Rajasthan Royals managed to defeat the Gujarat Titans by 3 wickets. After a poor start, the Royals were led by Sanju Samson's explosive innings and Shimron Hetmyer's brilliant finish. Hetmyer, in particular, was in complete command of proceedings and proved his worth as the team's finisher. The Titans will have to consider their bowling towards the end, while the Royals will be pleased to have finally gotten one over their opponents.
